Name: Dwarf Umbrella Tree
Where: 6th Cross Road, 7th Main Road, II Stage, Indiranagar, Bangalore
Description: It is an evergreen shrub growing to 3-6 m tall, free-standing, or clinging to the trunks of other trees. The leaves are palmately compound, with 7-9 leaflets, the leaflets 9-20 cm long and 4-10 cm broad (though often smaller in cultivation). The flowers are produced in a 20 cm panicle of small umbels, each umbel 7-10 mm diameter with 5-10 flowers.
